text:
Hello everyone, I am new to HubSpot CMS for developers course . I got rejected in practicum , got a mail regarding rejection as elements missing.                 ->The theme should have a field to control the font used in the header and footer
->The theme should have a field to control the accent color used in the header and footer     . can someone help me out this.

Reminder: You can find our developer content on HubSpot academy by going to <https://academy.HubSpot.com/results?q=developer&library=true>  Additionally we have a YouTube Channel with a developer podcast and some great developer content <https://www.youtube.com/c/HubSpotDevelopers/playlists>
